description.value: Used for Notes in the My Story Now app. Notes appear in a timeline within the app and represent a communication between the patient and keyworker. Notes can be initiated (created) either by the patient or keyworker. Notes can also be private i.e. a 'note to self' if created by the patient with no recipient specified

definition.value: Sender is mandatory and must be either a Patient reference (when sent from the Msn app) or an Organisation reference (when sent from the Admin Portal. Organisation will refer to a resource created for MSNCYPC.

The Patient or Organisation which was the target of the communication. If Organisation the reference will be to the MSNCYPC resource (static data). Maximum of 1 recipient can be specified (0..1). If no recipient is specified, then treated as a private message only accessible by the sender.
Text only. Contains the body of the note in string format which is a communication from patient to keyworker or vice versa or a 'note-to-self' created by the patient.
This is the body of the note in string format which is a communication from patient to keyworker or vice versa or a 'note-to-self' created by the patient.

The status of the transmission. When a message is created by the Msn app the status is set to "in-progress". Once an administrator has read the message using the Admin portal the status is set to "completed". Private messages can either leave the status blank or it will stay in-progress.
The patient reference who was the focus of this communication.
